storyName: A Bolt From the Blue Oasis
storyInfo: Kal'tsit and Lillia have infiltrated the Pine Valley Retreat for some time now. While searching for an opportunity to get close to the Grand Duke, Kal'tsit seems to notice something a little unusual.

attributes.content: 17 Years Ago
1:37 P.M. \ Clear
Central Ursus, Pine Valley Retreat, Dining Hall
Sir, your coffee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Are you new?
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: I am, sir.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then ask around about how I take my coffee. Bring it to me again once you let it cool!
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: You damned Feline—eugh, a Feline! You disgusting wretch! I didn't go to war to have a Feline take care of me!
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: Get out of my sight!
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: My utmost apologies, sir, this is my oversight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please don't tell the head caretaker. I'll prepare it again for you right away...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph! If you don't want to lose your job, you have three minutes to do it over, properly.
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: Also... is something wrong with your eyes? If you don't know how to smile, I'll tear that face of yours off.
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: Please don't... I'm very sorry to displease you. I'll go and redo it right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Peh. Servants these days. Is a nice figure all they have to offer?
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: I am very sorry, sir. Please do not get angry.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It would be highly detrimental to your condition.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Out of the way!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Yes, yes. Very sorry.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Miss? Hey, Miss!
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Are you referring to me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right. Miss, I saw the whole thing just now. Don't you lose heart.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: That's a Patrol Unit head... you know, you could say, people like that have no right coming to the retreat.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: He certainly isn't a noble... Does he not worry about offending others, acting so tyrannically?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They say some count's very fond of him... ah, and not just that. Coming here for his 'battlefield condition?' I heard that's hokum. Bet he hasn't stepped foot on a battlefield in his life.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: I heard he helped the count do some dirty work, and got sent here so he could keep his head down. With a supporter like that, and with people like us, of course he lets all hell's bells loose.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: ...A count...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I never imagined a scoundrel like that could climb high enough to befriend a count.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's how it is! Who knows when one day he'll be made some lord of somewhere! Dressed all clean and fine and sitting behind some enormous desk... agh.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Anyway, don't you get angry. Piss off people like that, and you'll wish it was an Originium Slug stuck to you instead. What on Terra is a fine young girl like you even doing, working out here...
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Never tell anyone I told you this, and don't go asking about, or else you'll get burnt!
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Yes... I understand. Thank you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ack. The next you see him, stay away a little. Heaven knows what he'll do to you—ah, is that the new doctor?
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, oh, so you know each other... then I'll get out of your way. Definitely not break time, after all. Take care, and don't let the head caretaker see you.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: She cares a lot about us newcomers. She's a good one.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You're right, Dr. Louisa. We cannot let her down.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Will you still be busy with work in a bit? There's some things I'd like to tell you.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Apologies, doctor... I still need to brew a new cup of coffee. If that count's pet doesn't continue to pick bones with me, I'll find you right after.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright, then... remember to be careful, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Dr. Louisa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's just us two right now, Kal'tsit. You should be using an alias.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: 'Louisa.' Borrowing your daughter's name. A disguise of that level is purely for humiliating the Secret Police.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In their eyes, I am already dead. And after this incident, I'll leave Ursus, and may not be able to return for a very long time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Nobody will know the Grand Duke's death was a murder. The next time they come to the Grand Duke's side, they will only discover that in his old age, his breathing stopped.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Will Ursus technology not be enough to analyze the poison you've made?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: At present, I assure you this exceeds their understanding of what a 'poison' is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For how many years can your knowledge stay ahead of Ursus? Director?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: The Empire's progress has already surpassed what I imagined, but these are not details we need to discuss right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lillia, your hoped-for arbitration can only end in this way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: None of you have the means to seek further revenge; it is unreasonable. Only the paramount Emperor of Ursus would be capable of erasing the Grand Duke's honor, significance, and all else.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I know...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Good. In that case, is this the place?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes. We have no idea what Grand Duke Vanya is chronically afflicted with.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: But I found out from the head caretaker that every afternoon at three, Vanya will leave his own monitoring room, and come here to relax.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: He sunbathes here until sunset. When he has the occasional guests, he'll have his dinner right here with them.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: There's no way we can get close to the Grand Duke's room, but as for here...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: We're standing right here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: But he won't be without bodyguards. The whole corridor will be sealed off when the time comes.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Apart from any guests cleared to be with the Grand Duke, only his medical adviser, as well as the servants, are allowed to enter this area.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Even so, the Ursus nobles won't permit the workers to come to this balcony freely.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We've already waited for long enough. The longer we spend, the riskier this gets.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I understand. There has to be some gap, there has to be an opening... the Grand Duke's medical advisers work in shifts, so it might be me before we know it. Today, or perhaps tomorrow.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Lillia, tell me the truth.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After the Grand Duke dies, what will you do?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why ask this now? We should be focusing on what's before us—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I'm hoping you can answer me with reality.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Before we reached Pine Valley, I received one final letter from Vampilov's family.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Sergei is still diligently serving Boris, and the city... has changed course. Perhaps this is the start of something changing.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: They killed so many people... yet their conscience is still so clear. They rest so easily...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You found out about Sergei's betrayal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But no excuse can bring back the dead.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Sergei can't offer any further scientific assistance. Perhaps in a few years, they'll formally call a halt to the project. And then? I just sit back and watch Sergei and Boris continue to collude, to trample over everything?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Though Grand Duke Vanya will be dead, you don't plan to stop.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There's no way I can pardon Sergei. The first time I met him, Astrov was drunk, hugging me so excited, telling me all about how he had such upstanding, excellent colleagues.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: He looked forward to this project like no one else, and I supported him. I supported him with all I could.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Even up to now.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Director Kal'tsit, you know everything, don't you?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: If you won't speak up, I'll return to Chernobog. I'll settle things once and for all.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Vampilov's family have an escape route to Sami ready for me, but maybe, I wouldn't get the chance to hitchhike with any Messengers. And you...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I do plan to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh... of course.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I'm very well aware, I'm setting myself alight. So... Kal'tsit, no matter whether you plan to confess all the facts to me or not, at the very least there's one tiny thing I want you to agree to.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I know I'm doing something insane right now, and I know maybe you're the one in the right. But right now, I only have one request. Look after my daughter. Look after Louisa.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: The next generation doesn't need to inherit the hassle of hatred... Even if nobody can escape this cycle in the end, at least promise me, Kal'tsit. Look after her. If you can, please look after Lyudmila too...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Dr. Louisa? Dr. Louisa, where are you?
attributes.name: Caretaker's Voice

attributes.content: Here! Please wait one moment!
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... I...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I promise you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is simply a mother's final wish. I will see Louisa grow up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Astrov—the last time he held little Louisa's hand, he told me something, half-jokingly.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: He said, he hoped little Louisa would become a medical researcher just like me, and when Louisa was old enough to go to school, he hoped you'd be her very first teacher.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Those were the very last words he said to his daughter before he suddenly went to the Institute that night.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Oh, doctor, here you are! Perfect, if you were any later, the head caretaker would've gone ballistic.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Hm? Doctor, what's got your eyes all red? Did something happen?
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Nothing. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: It's time to make rounds.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: I wasn't even paying attention... right, I understand.
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Is there some kind of commotion over there?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Yes, seems an old nobleman's come from far off. Don't know for what.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: As long as the days go by smooth, that's what matters.
attributes.name: Elderly Caretaker

attributes.content: Hello—
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Excuse me, we're currently making rounds... It seems you weren't on the list of scheduled visitors. Can I ask who you are?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Just an Ursus citizen here on a whim, looking to meet an old friend. Do carry on, madam.
I hope I don't bother any of you in your work.
Witte, are you off?
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: No, old friend, I'll see you again in a bit. You should be more mindful of your health, with winter here. Don't set off that asthma of yours.
As you were, madam. I'll be waiting in the hall.
Minister Witte!
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Do watch out.
Ah, I, sorry...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: The Grand Duke didn't know you were visiting. It's our negligence on the job to blame. As a token of apology, the Grand Duke would like you to have dinner with him.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: We hope you understand, the Grand Duke is ill, and if not for that, he would've greeted you himself...
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Huff.
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: Ah, I'm sorry, I'm greatly sorry...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: What's wrong with you! In the presence of the Minister—
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Oh, nothing, just some alcohol spilled on the bedsheets.
attributes.name: Veteran-Like Person

attributes.content: Calm down. Madam, what happened?
I'm sorry, the cap on the isopropyl bottle was too tight, and I applied too much force...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: You could've just asked someone else to help.
Sorry, so sorry, I'll go and fetch a towel right now...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Poor her.
As for the Grand Duke's invitation, I do regret that my Messenger is still waiting for me, and I can't stay so long.

Do pass a message on to Vanya. Tell him to rest up with peace of mind here. Though he should remember, also, that this is a meritorious place for those Our Majesty gives favor, and not another social hub for the nobility to mingle in.
Ah... got it, got it... if you could just hold on... the Grand Duke will be very sad to hear.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: This is official business. If I have to choose between Our Majesty and the Grand Duke, I'm forced to wrong the Grand Duke Vanya.
Ergh...! You should've spoke sooner! If that's so, the Grand Duke will surely empathize with you.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: May your road be evergreen.
attributes.name: Ursus Officer

attributes.content: Send him my regards.
Dr. Louisa, what's wrong...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, who is he?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Viscount Islam Witte.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You recognize him...?
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: Ursus's new Minister of Finance, a fresh noble with deep favor from the Emperor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Lillia

attributes.content: It's alright, Dr. Louisa.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have only surface knowledge of his character, and don't know specifically how he made his fortune. But what I do know is, he's a present pillar who the Emperor of Ursus has personally assisted.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And young elites like him can only have their sights set on the whole of Ursus. To the waves of crisis crashing against the Empire, the crises of Chernobog are mere tiny ripples.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even a Grand Duke of Ursus—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Hold on... hold on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Minister of Finance came to Pine Valley, yet has no armed entourage?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh... I don't think so.
attributes.name: Lillia
